room_title: Escape room "The Attic" by Bolt NWA in Bentonville
room_address: 404 SW Regional Airport Blvd Bentonville, AR 72712
room_description:
You have played in their world. Now play as the kids who have been warned to stay out of Grandma's Attic. But why? What is in there that could be so bad? It seems Grandpa had fallen behind on repairs and now the door is stuck shut? See if you can find a way out before you get caught.
The Attic has gained a revamp as it followed us over to the new location. No longer just Grandma's junk... There is more to the story that you will have to discover.
